com.android.car.internal

类 LargeParcelableBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.car.internal.LargeParcelableBase
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    直接已知子类:
    AsyncPropertyServiceRequestList, CarPropertyConfigList, GetSetValueResultList, LargeParcelable, Payload

    public abstract class LargeParcelableBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Base class to allow passing (@code Parcelable} over binder directly or through shared memory if payload size is too big.

    Child class should inherit this to use this or use LargeParcelable class.

    Parcelized data will have following elements

    • @Nullable Parcelable
    • @Nullable SharedMemory which include serialized Parcelable if non-null. This will be set only when the previous Parcelable is null or this also can be null for no data case.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int MAX_DIRECT_PAYLOAD_SIZE
      Payload size bigger than this value will be passed over shared memory.

    • 构造器概要

        public static final int MAX_DIRECT_PAYLOAD_SIZE

    • 方法详细资料

      • serialize

        protected abstract void serialize(Parcel dest,
                                  int flags)
        Serialize (=write Parcelable into given Parcel) a Parcelable child class wants to pass over binder call.

      • serializeNullPayload

        protected abstract void serializeNullPayload(Parcel dest)
        Serialize null payload to the given Parcel. For Parcelable, this can be simply dest.writeParcelable(null) but non-Parcelable should have other way to mark that there is no payload.

      • deserialize

        protected abstract void deserialize(Parcel src)
        Read a Parcelable from the given Parcel.

      • writeToParcel

        public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest,
                          int flags)

      • describeContents

        public int describeContents()

      • close

        public void close()

        Close the underlying shared memory for this. This can be called multiple times safely. When this is not called explicitly, it will be closed when this instance is GCed. Calling this can be useful when many instances are created frequently.

        If underlying payload is changed, the client should call this before sending it over binder as sending it over binder can keep shared memory generated from the previous binder call.

        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.io.Closeable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable

      • serializeParcelToSharedMemory

        protected static SharedMemory serializeParcelToSharedMemory(Parcel p)

      • copyFromSharedMemory

        protected static Parcel copyFromSharedMemory(SharedMemory memory)
